item.title: Music
item.description: Since the age of 13, Chris has been playing the guitar. He later picked up drums and has always sang; and this lead to a hobbyist career in music. Chris has played in numerous bands throughout the years; most recently as a session guitarist and collaborator for Martyn Peters. He has also played in a 22 piece Rhythm and Blues Orchestra; in the pit for a production of Jason Robert Brown’s The Last Five Years as well as recording, mixing and mastering his own music.

item.title: Writing
item.description: It was only a matter of time for Chris began writing, given that his Mum is a published author of both fiction and reference books. At his role at razorblue, Chris has authored a number of technical documents relating to IT processes, the clarity of which is essential for their engineers. In a more journalistic capacity, Chris has written for Thryve.world as a travel and adventure writer; describing adventures in the Lake District on two wheels.
